ygData.subject: RE: RE: something about slow vs. fast weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail and Well Met - my dear brother bard - faire Crier Sharpsong! Aye tis thee truth ye speak! For thee sins I have commited, I shall endeavour to repent!
ygData.messageBody:
Hail and Well Met - my dear brother bard - faire Crier Sharpsong!

Aye tis thee truth ye speak! For thee sins I have commited, I shall
endeavour to repent!

Verily, tis one of the finer elements of our faire community that it gathers
together such a diverse group of fine folks. And with such, one needs some
compassion and understanding of thee different cultures. Whilst tis true we
can all speak the common tongue, for some even thee common tongue is not thy
native tongue.

And tis true that the very nature of thee beast, yields to thee temptation
to condense communications, rather than enjoy thee luxury of expounding on
the beauty of the words themselves. Forsooth, we have these abominations to
some cultures known as 'd00d-isms' And. 'tis ironic indeed to resort to use
of same for chastising another's use of some <g>

Sylly Songsynger
Bard of the 27th song
<Spirit of the Moon>
somewhere on Innoruuk

p.s. sorry could not resist <s> and its lots better than what my first reply
was gonna be <eg>

p.s.s. imho, (hehe u prolly don't like that either) the d00d-isms and EQ
acronyms _are_ part of the EQ kulture - like em or not - there they are.
But seriously, I will tone down... <maybe>

p.s.s.s. I play at odd hours and have been with parties who are from all
over asia: hong kong, taiwan, japan, etc. Some of the EQ'ism's are a big
help to communicate with these guys. They understand "u rock!" lots better
than "verily, thou dost slew an abominable creature!"

p.s.s.s.s. My 47th b-day will be Oct 13th (if you want to get me something
nice, I would like a Crystalline Blade). Last month, I took back my first
pair of bifocals because they gave me a bad headache playing EQ and now have
2 sets of eyeglasses :-)~

p.s.s.s.s.s. and finally, I will use the old stand-by get out of jail free
card: 'hey, I am just role playing! My role is a "powergamer"!!' Heheh.


-----Original Message-----
From: JasonF [mailto:JasonF@...]
Sent: Thursday, September 23, 1999 11:44 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] RE: something about slow vs.
fast weapons

From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>

Sylly,

I don't want to offend you, and I realize that this is an
informal email list
for a game, but damn. Your message was just plain hard to
read. Could you
please attempt to use more English words and fewer d00disms?
Some of us are
old-timers and it's really hard to read that while squinting
through our
bifocals.

Crier Sharpsong - 24th song bard on Fennin Ro

Jason A. Farqu´┐¢
CDI at http://www.pigging.com/


> If u wanna catch ur fiends, u shud partner with the lowest
one of them and
> kill every thing in sight that cons xp to u. He won't get
much becuz it will
> be low con to him but you shud rock xp and with his help
(or really u
> helping him kill ez stuffs to him) you should lev up
pretty fast - faster
> than solo I'd say. Go hammer on Herman the Hermit (South
Karana) get xp,
> fs weps & if u do the _great_ bard quest another copy of
your lev 1 song!
> woo hoo that really rocks!
>
> Sylly
